info.title: My API
info.description: This is a Social Media App Server based on OpenAPI 3.0 specification.

get.description: Initiates the GitHub authentication process.
Callback endpoint for GitHub authentication process.

post.summary: Bulk create posts by user ID
post.description: Endpoint to bulk create posts for a specific user.
Endpoint to bulk create posts for multiple users.
Endpoint to create a new post.

post.summary: Create post profiles from JSON file by admin
post.description: Endpoint to create post profiles from JSON file by admin

get.description: Endpoint to export posts as admin

post.description: Endpoint to create a like for a post.

get.description: Endpoint to get posts by user ID.
Endpoint to get a specific post by ID.

get.summary: Get likes count for a post
get.description: Endpoint to get the number of likes for a specific post.

post.description: Endpoint to create multiple users in bulk.
Endpoint to create an action definition.

get.description: Endpoint to get all action definitions.

put.description: Endpoint to edit an existing action definition.

post.description: Endpoint to create a level definition.

get.description: Endpoint to get all level definitions.

post.description: Endpoint to create a user action.
Endpoint to create a user level.

get.description: Endpoint to get all user levels.

post.description: Endpoint to create multiple follow relationships in bulk.
Endpoint to create a user profile and give him a level.

get.description: Endpoint to get users.

post.summary: Create users from JSON file by admin
post.description: Endpoint to create users from JSON file by admin

get.description: Endpoint to export users as admin.

post.description: Endpoint to create a notification for a like on a post.
Endpoint to create a notification for a comment on a post.

get.description: Endpoint to get the details of the authenticated user.
Endpoint to get actions performed by a user.

get.summary: Get user levels by user ID
get.description: Endpoint to get user levels based on the user ID.

put.description: Endpoint to update an existing user level.

get.description: Endpoint to get the followings of a user.
Endpoint to get the followers of a user.
Endpoint to get the follow requests for the authenticated user.
Endpoint to get notifications for a user.
Endpoint to get the follow status between the authenticated user and another user.

get.summary: Get Github repos of an user
get.description: Endpoint to get the Github repos of an user
Endpoint to get a specific user by ID.

put.summary: Edit user profile. Only for admin.
put.description: Endpoint to edit user profile as admin.

delete.description: Endpoint to delete user profile as admin.

put.description: Endpoint to update a level definition.

delete.summary: Delete a level definition by ID
delete.description: Endpoint to delete a level definition by its ID.

put.description: Endpoint to update an existing user action.

delete.summary: Delete a user action by ID
delete.description: Endpoint to delete a user action by its ID.

put.description: Endpoint to accept a follow request.
Endpoint to reject a follow request.

delete.summary: Delete an action definition by ID
